name: badmouthing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
bad-mouth
to say bad things about someone to other people: Her co-workers bad-mouthed her to her boss. You'll never hear him badmouthing an opponent.
More examplesFewer examplesYou can promote your own qualities in a positive way without bad-mouthing others.This woman is running around badmouthing a very successful scheme.Instead of bad-mouthing those who do well, we should congratulate them for their achievements. He is understood to be privately furious at the way he has been bad-mouthed.In private party members are badmouthing their leader.
